title: T207 Mogridge and Pelty Broadleafs for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: T207 Mogridge and Pelty Broadleafs for sale
posts.post_content:
Free shipping within the U.S.

Both are very strong for the grade.  Freshly graded, cases have no scratches etc.

Some recent sales that I used to determine pricing:
[url]http://www.pwccauctions.com/item.php?item_no=641689[/url]
[url]http://www.bst-auctions.com/lot-226.aspx[/url] (note that this is an Anonymous back rather than BL)
[url]http://www.bst-auctions.com/lot-213.aspx[/url]

Mogridge SGC 30 $600 

Pelty SGC 50 $650
I'm open to offers if anyone is looking for either of these cards
